Caption: Figure 6: Behavior of the incoming traffic (strength) sin as a function of the number of server-to-client connections (degree) kin . The behavior is linear on a double logarith- mic scale and is well approximated by power-law behavior with slope Î²in      1.2. In this and the following distribu- tion maps, tones represent frequencies of strength values, normalized within each degree bin, on a log scale.
